translation.description: This dashboard highlights the performance of wholesale and retail trade (including trade of motor vehicles) in Malaysia. The data is published by DOSM on a monthly basis and uses the detailed classification of industries per the Malaysia Standard Industrial Classification (MSIC) 2008, Version 1.0. This classification is in line with the International Standard Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities Revision 4, published by the United Nations Statistics Division.

section_1.title: How is wholesale and retail trade trending?
